statements: SELECT * FROM VPNAccessPermissions;
SELECT username, access_level FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, last_access FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY last_access DESC;
SELECT * FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE access_level = 'Admin' AND username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY last_access DESC;
SELECT username, access_level FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE user_id > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM VPNAccessPermissions;
SELECT * FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM VPNAccessPermissions WHERE access_level = 'User';
SELECT * FROM vpn_users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM vpn_users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, action FROM vpn_access_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM vpn_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, action FROM vpn_access_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM vpn_users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, access_level FROM vpn_users WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) FROM vpn_access_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 10 ORDER BY count(*) DESC;
SELECT vpn_access_log.timestamp, vpn_users.username FROM vpn_access_log JOIN vpn_users ON vpn_access_log.user_id = vpn_users.user_id WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY vpn_access_log.timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(access_level) AS max_access_level, MIN(access_level) AS min_access_level FROM vpn_users;
SELECT * FROM vpn_users;
SELECT username, user_role FROM vpn_users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM vpn_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
SELECT * FROM vpn_users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read' ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM vpn_users INNER JOIN user_permissions ON vpn_users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM vpn_users JOIN user_roles ON vpn_users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE user_role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_users WHERE user_role IN ('admin', 'user') AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM VPNUsers ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM VPNUsers WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT username, password FROM VPNUsers WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM VPNAuditLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM VPNAccessLogs WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM VPNUsers WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT username, access_level FROM VPNUsers WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT audit_id, action, timestamp FROM VPNAuditLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT permission_type FROM VPNPermissions;
SELECT u.username, a.login_time, a.logout_time FROM VPNUsers u JOIN VPNAccessLogs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.access_level = 3;
SELECT * FROM vpn_users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM vpn_users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT group_name FROM vpn_groups ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT username, log_timestamp FROM vpn_logs JOIN vpn_users ON vpn_logs.user_id = vpn_users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM vpn_permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM vpn_users WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM vpn_users WHERE access_level = 2 AND username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT u.username, g.group_name FROM vpn_users u INNER JOIN vpn_user_groups ug ON u.user_id = ug.user_id INNER JOIN vpn_groups g ON ug.group_id = g.group_id
SELECT l.log_timestamp, l.log_description FROM vpn_logs l INNER JOIN vpn_users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'admin' ORDER BY l.log_timestamp ASC
SELECT p.permission_name, COUNT(ug.user_id) AS total_users FROM vpn_permissions p LEFT JOIN vpn_user_groups ug ON p.permission_id = ug.group_id GROUP BY p.permission_name HAVING COUNT(ug.user_id) > 3
